job_tasks.phrase: Bouw, implementeer, verbeter en onderhoud je AI standaard oplossingen en ML/Deep Learning oplossingen in nieuwe en bestaande applicaties (apps, webservices, en evt. andere frontends etc.).
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of building, implementing, improving, and maintaining AI/ML solutions within existing and new applications, which aligns with integrating AI into software products.

job_tasks.phrase: Zorg je voor de vertaling van complexe Machine Learning naar bruikbare applicaties.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves making complex ML models usable within applications, which is a form of integration and software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Bouw je model training scripts en data pipelines.
job_tasks.justification: Building model training scripts and data pipelines falls under the operational aspects of managing and preparing the ML lifecycle, aligning with MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Pas je verschillende vormen van Machine Learning toe in de contexten van beeldherkenning, Natural Language Processing, Spraakherkenning, Spraakgeneratie en Recommending Systems alsmede nieuwe en andere vormen van ML en het inbouwen hiervan in bestaande applicaties.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions applying various forms of Machine Learning (image recognition, NLP, speech recognition, speech generation, recommending systems) which is a core ML task.

job_tasks.phrase: Participeer je in projecten waar generatieve AI wordt gebruikt. Je implementeert daar ook oplossingen met retrieval-augmented generation of andere relevante technieken in de context van generatieve AI.
job_tasks.justification: This directly mentions implementing solutions with retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) and other generative AI techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: Ben je bezig met het verzamelen, opschonen en evalueren van data en met verbindingen maken met data bronnen.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the essential data engineering tasks of collecting, cleaning, evaluating data, and connecting to data sources.

job_tasks.phrase: Denk je mee met opdrachtgevers over het implementeren van machine learning modellen.
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding client needs and translating them into ML model implementations, which relates to business understanding and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Denk je mee in vraagstukken rondom kaders en ethiek binnen de context van artificial intelligence.
job_tasks.justification: Considering ethical frameworks and AI context aligns with understanding the broader business and societal implications of AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Geef je samen met de AI architect presentaties over AI.
job_tasks.justification: Giving presentations about AI, especially in collaboration with an AI architect, demonstrates communication skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Ben jij een ambitieuze machine learning engineer en wil je AI inzetten voor een verbetere dienstverlening van de Nederlandse overheid?
soft_skills.justification: This phrase highlights the ambition to use AI for improving public services, indicating an understanding of the broader societal and governmental context.

soft_skills.phrase: Geef je samen met de AI architect presentaties over AI.
soft_skills.justification: Giving presentations about AI, especially in collaboration with an AI architect, demonstrates communication skills.

profile.rationale: The job ad describes a balanced mix of core software engineering tasks (building, implementing, maintaining AI solutions in applications, creating data pipelines) and AI specialization tasks. Crucially, it explicitly mentions applying various ML techniques (NLP, speech, image recognition) and specifically implementing generative AI solutions with RAG. The technologies listed (Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch) are common in both traditional ML and GenAI, but the explicit mention of GenAI and RAG, alongside traditional ML tasks, points towards a Core GenAI Engineer profile. The role also involves client interaction and understanding business needs, further supporting this classification.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and detailed, explicitly mentioning both traditional ML tasks and specific Generative AI techniques like RAG. The responsibilities are well-defined, and the required technologies are listed, allowing for a confident classification of the role.
